testcase.classname: free CRM Login and create contact feature
testcase.name: Free CRM loginb and create new contact test scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is present on login page.........................................passed Then title of login page is Free CRM........................................passed Then user enters "jayeshgaurav" and "Gaurav@123"............................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user moves to contacts button..........................................passed Then user clicks on new contact link........................................passed Then user enters contact details "David" and "Warner" and "Captain".........passed Then user clicks on save button.............................................passed Then verify contact created.................................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
